name: ibm-security-qradar-soar
label: IBM Security QRadar SOAR
description: IBM Security QRadar SOAR is a software platform designed to help organizations manage and respond to security incidents effectively. It provides a comprehensive approach to incident response by integrating with various security tools and automating processes to streamline incident handling.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the IBM Resilient server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the IBM Resilient server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the API key to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations
fields.name: api_key
fields.tooltip: Specify the API key to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations

fields.title: API Secret
fields.description: Specify the API Secret to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations
fields.name: api_secret
fields.tooltip: Specify the API Secret to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations

fields.title: Organization ID
fields.description: Specify the ID of the organization to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations
fields.name: org_id
fields.tooltip: Specify the ID of the organization to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Create Incident
operations.description: Creates a incident in IBM Security QRadar SOAR based on the incident name, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specify a name of the incident to create in IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.tooltip: Specify a name of the incident to create in IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

parameters.title: Discovered Date
parameters.name: discovered_date
parameters.description: Specify the discovered date of the incident to create in IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the discovered date of the incident to create in IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify a description of the incident to create in IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.tooltip: Specify a description of the incident to create in IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

parameters.title: Include Full Data
parameters.name: want_full_data
parameters.description: If false an incidentDTO is returned instead of the default fullIncidentDataDTO. The fullIncidentDataDTO contains everything about the incident. The incidentDTO will contain just a high level details.
parameters.tooltip: If false an incidentDTO is returned instead of the default fullIncidentDataDTO. The fullIncidentDataDTO contains everything about the incident. The incidentDTO will contain just a high level details.

parameters.title: Include Tasks Property
parameters.name: want_tasks
parameters.description: If true the fullIncidentDataDTO tasks property gets filled in also. The default is false. Note that this parameter is ignored if "Include Full Data" is false.
parameters.tooltip: If true the fullIncidentDataDTO tasks property gets filled in also. The default is false. Note that this parameter is ignored if "Include Full Data" is false.

parameters.title: Incident Data Types
parameters.description: Specify the information about the types of data that were lost (e.g First Name, Last Name, Credit card number, etc.)
parameters.tooltip: Specify the information about the types of data that were lost (e.g First Name, Last Name, Credit card number, etc.)
parameters.name: dtm

parameters.title: Record Counts
parameters.description: Specify the information about the counts of records that were lost for the different geographical regions.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the information about the counts of records that were lost for the different geographical regions.
parameters.name: cm

parameters.title: Regulators
parameters.description: Specify the information about the regulators that are in effect for the incident. Note that the ids property of the regulatorsDTO contains non-state/province regulators. So for example, you'd include the ID of the "GLB Act" regulator here. State regulators will be used if record counts are specified for that state.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the information about the regulators that are in effect for the incident. Note that the ids property of the regulatorsDTO contains non-state/province regulators. So for example, you'd include the ID of the "GLB Act" regulator here. State regulators will be used if record counts are specified for that state.
parameters.name: regulators

parameters.title: Hipaa
parameters.description: Specify the  information required by HIPAA. If HIPAA does not apply to this incident then the hipaa propert can be empty.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the  information required by HIPAA. If HIPAA does not apply to this incident then the hipaa propert can be empty.
parameters.name: hipaa

parameters.title: Artifacts
parameters.description: Specify the list of tasks for the incident.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of tasks for the incident.
parameters.name: artifacts

parameters.title: Findings
parameters.description: Specify the list of findings for the incident.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of findings for the incident.
parameters.name: findings

parameters.title: Comments
parameters.description: Specify the some notes for the incident.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the some notes for the incident.
parameters.name: comments

parameters.title: Custom Properties
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the additional properties, in the JSON format, that you want to specify for the incident being created in IBM Security QRadar SOAR. The additional properties signify additional fields associated with the incident.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the additional properties, in the JSON format, that you want to specify for the incident being created in IBM Security QRadar SOAR. The additional properties signify additional fields associated with the incident.
parameters.name: additional_fields

operations.title: Search Incidents
operations.description: Retrieves all incidents from IBM Security QRadar SOAR based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Filters
parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Specify the filters to apply in the query to retrieve filtered records from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the filters to apply in the query to retrieve filtered records from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

parameters.title: Include Records
parameters.name: include_records_total
parameters.description: Select to include or exclude total count of the incidents that match the given filters in the response. This is set to true by default.
parameters.tooltip: Select to include or exclude total count of the incidents that match the given filters in the response. This is set to true by default.

parameters.title: Return Level
parameters.name: return_level
parameters.description: Select the incident data structure returned. Possible values are Partial, Normal, or Full.
parameters.tooltip: Select the incident data structure returned. Possible values are Partial, Normal, or Full.

parameters.title: Field Handle
parameters.name: field_handle
parameters.description: Specify the list of custom fields returned with the incident data.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of custom fields returned with the incident data.

parameters.title: Length
parameters.name: length
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to return in the response. Possible values are: Null or any value less than 1 to retrieve all records, up to the server-configured maximum limit. If the value is greater than 0 and exceeds the server-configured limit, an error will be thrown.
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of records to return in the response. Possible values are: Null or any value less than 1 to retrieve all records, up to the server-configured maximum limit. If the value is greater than 0 and exceeds the server-configured limit, an error will be thrown.

parameters.title: Start
parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specify the paging to retrieve the first indicator record from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the paging to retrieve the first indicator record from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

parameters.title: Records Total
parameters.name: recordsTotal
parameters.description: The total number of records to be fetched for the current query from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.tooltip: The total number of records to be fetched for the current query from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

parameters.title: Sorts
parameters.name: sorts
parameters.description: Specify the sorts to apply in the query to retrieve filtered records from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sorts to apply in the query to retrieve filtered records from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

parameters.title: Logic Type
parameters.name: logic_type
parameters.description: Specify the logic type to apply to these filters. Defaults to ANY if logic type is not specified.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the logic type to apply to these filters. Defaults to ANY if logic type is not specified.

operations.title: Get Incidents Simulations
operations.description: Retrieve a list of simulations from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

parameters.title: Want Closed
parameters.description: Select this option, if closed simulations are to be returned (as well as open ones), otherwise it will return only open simulations.
parameters.name: want_closed
parameters.tooltip: Select this option, if closed simulations are to be returned (as well as open ones), otherwise it will return only open simulations.

operations.title: Get Incident Details
operations.description: Retrieves a specific incident from IBM Security QRadar SOAR based on the incident ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.description: Specify the incident ID to retrieve its details from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the incident ID to retrieve its details from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

parameters.title: Version
parameters.name: vers
parameters.description: Specify the latest version that the client already has. If the server hasn't changed since that version then an "HTTP 304 Not Modified" will be returned.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the latest version that the client already has. If the server hasn't changed since that version then an "HTTP 304 Not Modified" will be returned.

parameters.title: Include Findings
parameters.name: want_findings
parameters.description: Determines whether the findings of an incident will be returned. If this value is true, the findings will be returned. The default is to return the findings.
parameters.tooltip: Determines whether the findings of an incident will be returned. If this value is true, the findings will be returned. The default is to return the findings.

operations.title: Get Incident Tasks
operations.description: Retrieve a list of tasks for the incident from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.description: Specify the incident ID to retrieve its details from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the incident ID to retrieve its details from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

parameters.title: Want Layouts
parameters.description: Select this option, if tasks layout property gets filled in also. By default it set as false.
parameters.name: want_layouts
parameters.tooltip: Select this option, if tasks layout property gets filled in also. By default it set as false.

parameters.title: Want Notes
parameters.description: Select this option, if tasks note property gets filled in also. By default it set as false.
parameters.name: want_notes
parameters.tooltip: Select this option, if tasks note property gets filled in also. By default it set as false.

operations.title: Update Incident
operations.description: Updates an incident in IBM Security QRadar SOAR based on the incident ID, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the incident to update in IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the incident to update in IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

parameters.title: Changes
parameters.name: changes
parameters.description: Specify the list of changes to apply to the database object.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of changes to apply to the database object.

parameters.title: Version
parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the object as you know it to be. If the version number matches, the PATCH changes are accepted without conflict checking.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the version of the object as you know it to be. If the version number matches, the PATCH changes are accepted without conflict checking.

operations.title: Close Incident
operations.description: Closed an incident in IBM Security QRadar SOAR based on the incident ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the incident to close in IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the incident to close in IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

operations.title: Get Incident Artifacts
operations.description: Retrieves all artifacts that are associated with an incidents from IBM Security QRadar SOAR based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the incident to retrieve it's artifacts from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the incident to retrieve it's artifacts from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

operations.description: Retrieves all the notes associated with an incident from IBM Security QRadar SOAR based on the incident ID that you have specified.

parameters.description: Specify the ID of the incident to retrieve notes from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the incident to retrieve notes from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

parameters.description: Specify the ID of the incident to retrieve attachments from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the incident to retrieve attachments from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

parameters.description: Specify the ID of the incident to retrieve attachments from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.name: incidentID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the incident to retrieve attachments from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

operations.title: Get All Incident Details
operations.description: Retrieves all details associated with an incident from IBM Security QRadar SOAR based on the incident ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the incident to retrieve it's details from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.
parameters.name: incidentID
